articles.description: The former Chelsea and Real Madrid coach still has two years left on his current deal at Roma having signed a three-year deal with the Italian side at the start of last season.
articles.content:
Jose Mourinho is emerging as a surprise option to replace Mauricio Pochettino at Paris Saint-Germain.
Former Spurs boss Pochettino's future in Paris is in major doubt despite winning Ligue 1 last se… [+2312 chars]
